channel.title: CVE Feed for Danfoss -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Danfoss -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-22582|2024-10-16T11:52:24.088Z -- danfoss -- ak-em100
item.description: The Danfoss AK-EM100 web applications allow for Reflected Cross-Site Scripting.

item.title: CVE-2023-25912|2024-10-16T11:52:23.585Z -- danfoss -- ak-em100
item.description: The webreport generation feature in the Danfoss AK-EM100 allows an unauthorized actor to generate a web report that discloses sensitive information such as the internal IP address, usernames and internal device values.

item.title: CVE-2023-25911|2024-10-16T11:52:24.564Z -- danfoss -- ak-em100
item.description: The Danfoss AK-EM100 web applications allow for an authenticated user to perform OS command injection through the web application parameters.

item.title: CVE-2023-22583|2024-10-16T11:52:23.338Z -- danfoss -- ak-em100
item.description: The Danfoss AK-EM100 web forms allow for SQL injection in the login forms.

item.title: CVE-2023-22586|2024-10-16T11:52:24.330Z -- danfoss -- ak-em100
item.description: The Danfoss AK-EM100 web applications allow for Local File Inclusion in the file parameter.

item.title: CVE-2023-22584|2024-10-16T11:52:23.839Z -- danfoss -- ak-em100
item.description: The Danfoss AK-EM100 stores login credentials in cleartext.

item.title: CVE-2023-22585|2024-10-16T11:52:23.110Z -- danfoss -- ak-em100
item.description: The Danfoss AK-EM100 web applications allow for Reflected Cross-Site Scripting in the title parameter.

item.title: CVE-2023-25915|2024-10-16T11:52:22.846Z -- danfoss -- ak-sm800a
item.description: Due to improper input validation, an authenticated remote attacker could execute arbitrary commands on the target system.

item.title: CVE-2023-25913|2024-10-16T11:52:22.601Z -- danfoss -- ak-sm800a
item.description: Because of an authentication flaw an attacker would be capable of generating a web report that discloses sensitive information such as internal IP addresses, usernames, store names and other sensitive information.

item.title: CVE-2023-25914|2024-10-16T11:52:22.354Z -- danfoss -- ak-sm800a
item.description: Due to improper restriction, authenticated attackers could retrieve and read system files of the underlying server through the XML interface. The information that can be read can lead to a full system compromise.
